name: @twodashes/universal
description: Like @lodash, but with more dashes (lots of functionality, and uses underscores instead of camelCase). Kitchen sink utilities and "pure" functions (almost pure - sorting use [].sort()). Promises, filtering, sorting, combining, text analysis, math, curry, sleep, etc. See also @twodashes/node and @twodashes/browser.
scripts_docs: 1. **cut_index** - Copy ./esm/index.js to ./index.mjs (so it does not get converted in next step)
4. **cjs_index** - Convert ./esm/index.js to ./cjs/index.js (so it can get processed without reference to other files)

scripts.build: npm run cut_index && npm run cjs && npm run put_index && npm run cjs_index && npm run browser
scripts.browser: rm -rf .parcel-cache && rm -rf __ && parcel build cjs/* && mv dist __
scripts.cjs: rm -rf cjs && rollup esm/*.js --format cjs --dir cjs/ --exports auto -p @rollup/plugin-node-resolve
scripts.umd: rm -rf umd && rollup esm/*.js --format umd --dir umd/ --exports auto -p @rollup/plugin-node-resolve
